name: Takenobu Tokunaga
content: Research topics [徳永研究室Tokunaga Lab.] en:start Research topics We work on various research topics related to computational linguistics and natural language processing. Recent topics include Corpus construction environment, Analysis of annotators behaviour during the corpus annotation process, Multimodal dialogue systems, Natural language generation, Intelligent information access. We do not accept students currently. en/start.txt · Last modified: 2025/04/01 14:51 by admin
